name: Red Duende
description:
Oh no! It's your first day on the job as a delivery pilot in your space base and you're under attack! Deliver resources to the different characters, but if you can't do it fast enough, their shops will get shot down down.

Controls:
Tab - Characters and Missions
Up - Forward
Down - Back
Left - Left
Up - Right
Left Click - Add item to inventory
Right Click - Remove item from inventory
Space - Boost

Developers:

Programming:
Pyro - https://github.com/DylanMcBean
Wrighter - https://www.instagram.com/wrightwrighter/

Art:
Jacob Mobley - https://jacobmobleyart.com/
